title: FPS drop since 7.3
body:
My FPS keeps dropping  during trade or team fights in game to 20~30 since patch 7.3. I usually have 60~70 FPS 

My computer spec:
i5 4210U 
Intel HD graphic 4400(yes, not the best but still good enough for decent graphic).
graphic setting: medium.

replies.body: Make sure that all your drivers are updated

You've gott a solid rig, but outdated drivers or bad game files could be hindering your frame rate.  Run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your pc!  Let me know if you have any questions!
